page.title: 06Main Roads
page.content: There has always been a main road between Bristol and Exeter. In the summer it is very busy so in the l950s they built a diversion called the White Ball diversion.Now people use the new motorway because it is quicker than going by the A38. The A38 is quieter now. The motorway was first opened in l979. A great deal of traffic went on the motorway. We timed the M5 for 20 minutes to see how many went under the bridge (in our block), and this test was done on the A38 as well. Going northwards on the M5 191 cars went past, 1 motorbike, 48 lorries, 24 vans, 3 buses and 6 caravans. Going southwards 194 cars went past, 2 motorbikes, 49 lorries, 15 vans, 6 caravans and 5 buses. On the A38 going both ways in 20 mins. were 74 cars, 5 motorbikes, 30 lorries,9 vans 1 caravan and 1 bike.
